articles.title: EU seeks firm words on Russia at first summit with ASEAN - Reuters
articles.description: The European Union and the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) meet for their first summit on Wednesday to deepen economic ties, with European leaders pressing for firm, shared language critical of Russia.

articles.title: Maid uses elderly employer's savings to fund her own lifestyle, even 'treats' her to meal - AsiaOne
articles.description: A domestic helper here made several withdrawals from her employer’s account using her bank card, stealing up to $12,000 of savings. When her 76-year-old employer noticed she was shopping for clothes and accessories more often than usual, the maid told her the…

articles.title: Indian and Chinese soldiers injured in Himalayan mountain border clash - ABC News
articles.description: A border scuffle in the Himalayas between the two nuclear-armed Asian giants resulted in minor injuries but no casualties, India's defence minister says.
